content:

inventory=[{"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "tropical_fish", "quantity": 19, "index": 15}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 51, "index": 17}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 62, "index": 18}, {"type": "hopper", "quantity": 11, "index": 19}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 46, "index": 20}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 18, "index": 24}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 13, "index": 26}, {"type": "elytra", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 31, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_wool", "quantity": 47, "index": 31}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 26, "index": 32}, {"type": "nautilus_shell", "quantity": 46, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "green_carpet", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a soul torch, I need to first craft charcoal. I have birch_wood in slot 37, which I can smelt into slot 13.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 37 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "tropical_fish", "quantity": 19, "index": 15}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 51, "index": 17}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 62, "index": 18}, {"type": "hopper", "quantity": 11, "index": 19}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 46, "index": 20}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 18, "index": 24}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 13, "index": 26}, {"type": "elytra", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 31, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_wool", "quantity": 47, "index": 31}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 26, "index": 32}, {"type": "nautilus_shell", "quantity": 46, "index": 33}, {"type": "green_carpet", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: Now that I have the charcoal, I need to move it to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
